channel.title: Featured in on Anton S.
channel.description: Recent content in Featured in on Anton S.

item.title: DSI SUDS Research Day 2023
item.description: I was invited to Data Sciences Institute summer undergraduate research day. I presented and was voted best poster (1/3). The research day was a chance to appreciate the research of fellow undergrads and an opportunity to meet great people! Article

item.title: IBM at U of T Conference
item.description: On April 18, I had the chance to attend the U of T IBM Quantum Computing Conference along with other MSRG members. It was a great opportunity to see the Canadian research being supported by IBM. Article
